overview: Based on a true story from the case of the familiarity of the Thai people, the whole country, the story of Syamol young woman who was ruthlessly murdered in front of the 2-year-old baby. from the police investigation found that The mastermind is Pradit Former her own husband With a complicated plan But when arrested, along with the murder He returned to every denial.
tagline: Who says I want to kill you.
title: Syamol
